column1: Thank you for contacting Indiana's Seventh Congressional District.
I am honored to serve you.
It isalways a pleasure to hear from Hoosiers and all Americans about issues affecting our country.
Yourthoughts and opinions are important and help me represent you in Washington.
I will make every effort to respond to messages in a timely manner.
Always feel free to contact me or my staff at 317-283-6516 or 202-225-4011.
Again, thank you for contacting me.
Sincerely, André Carson Member of Congress
